Package ure.terrain

Class TerrainDeco

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.terrain.TerrainDeco
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable, UTerrain
    public class TerrainDeco
extends java.lang.Object
implements UTerrain, Interactable
    TerrainDeco implements a transparent handoff to its component terrain for all UTerrain methods. Extend this class to make a Decorator you can pass to TerrainCzar to intercept base UTerrain behavior. You need only override the methods you want to intercept; to pass control back to those methods simply call the super.method(), just as if you were extending UTerrain. To create differentiated subtypes of terrains, rather than affecting all base terrain behavior, you should directly subclass TerrainI or its subclasses such as Door.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TerrainDeco​(UTerrain realTerrain)
      Do not override the constructor.
